summary: Completed e2e testing of Corrispettivi and Fatture XML upload features. All 13 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tests passed for both pages including navigation, form interactions, and detail views.
critical_code_review_comments: Backend logs show XML parsing errors for corrispettivi with 'unbound prefix' - this is expected when users upload malformed XML files. The error handling is working correctly.
The Fatture page shows 'Nota Credito' badge for TD04 document type - this is correct Italian invoice terminology.
seed_data_creation: Test data created during backend tests with TEST_ prefix for corrispettivi and fatture uploads
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Corrispettivi and Fatture features are working correctly. Backend APIs tested: GET /api/corrispettivi, GET /api/invoices, POST /api/corrispettivi/upload-xml, POST /api/corrispettivi/upload-xml-bulk, POST /api/fatture/upload-xml, POST /api/fatture/upload-xml-bulk, DELETE endpoints. Duplicate detection working with 409 status code. Frontend pages load correctly with all buttons functional. Manual invoice creation form works. Invoice detail view works.

features_tested.navigation: PASS - All sidebar navigation links work correctly
